actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to provide increased unemployment compensation benefits for Vietnam era veterans.
short_title: Vietnam Era Veterans' Unemployment Assistance Act

summary.text: Vietnam Era Veterans' Unemployment Assistance Act - Authorizes the Secretary of Labor to enter into agreements with a State or State agency to provide unemployment supplementary compensation of $75 per week for 52 weeks as supplementary compensation for Vietnam era veterans to be paid from Federal funding. Authorizes the Secretary to issue necessary rules and regulations.

titles.title: Vietnam Era Veterans' Unemployment Assistance Act
A bill to provide increased unemployment compensation benefits for Vietnam era veterans.
